page.title: 03ST.MARY'S GOLF & YOUTH CLUB
page.content: GOLF CLUB It is a 9 hole golf course.It's cover is rough,gorse and heather,apart from the fairways and greens.The Club House has a bar,a fruit machine and a restaurant. VIDEO CLUB The video club costs Â£10:00 a year membership,and to hire a video out for a few days,it costs Â£2:00.The video choice changes once a week. YOUTH CLUB The Youth Club goes on twice a week(Mondays and Tuesdays).On a few occasions a Scillonian band gives a concert.It consists of 7 people.Lead guitar,rhythm guitar,bass guitar,drums,lead vocals and backing vocals. OTHER GROUPS Cubs and Brownies for younger kids.Cadets and Guides for the older kids.There is a Sailing Club and a Yacht Club.
